name: 550 Arlov
description: unique bullet for Vitrovski V-85 sniper rifle, it looks like .50 BMG but much more slim and stronger.

name: 550 Arlov Incendiary
description: Incendiary variant of 550 Arlov, this one has red tip that explode and burning target on hit.

name: 550 Arlov AP
description: Variant of 550 Arlov that uses reinforced material to increase penetration ability at cost of damage reduction.

name: 550 Arlov Explosive
description: Variant of 550 Arlov that uses explosive tip, a bit overkill for killing zombies but enough to give damage to hard targets.

name: 20mm Vulcan
description: bigger than .50 BMG, this 20mm bullet packs a powerful punch against everything. and maybe an overkill for killing some undeads and humans.

name: 9x39mm
description: Soviet rifle cartridge designed for good armor penetration and power, almost similar to 7.62 used by AK-47, this one is unique for VSS Vintorez.

name: Cannon Ball
description: huge ball of steel, specially designed to be fired from cannon of a boat or portable cannon. you can imagine crushing some zombies with this.
